You can be provided data in the form of xml, table, meaning representations, graphs etc.

final_response: The Acharya Institute of Technology is located in Soldevanahalli, on Acharya Dr. Sarvapalli Radhakrishnan Road, Hessarghatta Main Road, Bangalore – 560090. It is affiliated with Visvesvaraya Technological University and is situated in the state of Karnataka, India.
